title: E-learning-based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and ability to interpret work-related documents
context.additional_context: Emphasizes data analysis and budget management competencies for administrative efficiency, with a participatory design to enhance practical applicability within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners identify and correct mathematical errors in financial reports with 80% accuracy
Learners apply conditional probability calculations to solve workplace probability problems
Learners utilize at least two statistical analysis techniques (mean/standard deviation, regression analysis) when organizing team budgets within three months
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
